GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
NFC: NULL out the dev->rfkill to prevent UAF

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 4a68938f43b7c2663e4c90bb9bbe29ac8b9a42a0, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit 3e3b5dfcd16a3e254aab61bd1e8c417dd4503102. For more details please see the references link.
